name: Deflektion
description:
Deflektion is a fun, challenging and addictive puzzle game that makes you think ahead.

HOW TO PLAY

Collect the icons in the right order by rolling the ball over them. The path of the ball can be changed by placing deflektors in it's path. Various blocks will influence the path of the ball, some are advantageous and some are not. The ball is continuously moving and careful planning is needed to progress through each level.

DEFLEKTION features:

Addictive gameplay
Colourful graphics
Challenging puzzles to complete

Have fun!
